title: New: Shinies – Taste
body:
Mancunian rascals **Shinies** are set to release their debut EP **_Tangle_** later in the year, through Dirty Bingo, and have just released the first track to be lifted from said release.

_Taste_ is yet another example of why they’re one of the UK’s most underrated new artists, with their cutting wit and raucous, noise-pop stylings, it’s arguably their finest outing to date. In a time when UK guitar music is pretty much flat on its arse (Palma Violets, Peace, blah you know the rest), **Shinies** are a twinkling star of hope. Check out _Taste_ below, and keep your eyes peeled for their EP, out 12 August.
